groundtruth: Te obiektywne działania, jak np. współczynnik zwężenia jamy ustno-gardłowej, zostały opracowane tutaj na UCD ale nie są dotychczas rutynowo stosowane przez innych lekarzy.

eng: Both the safety and blood sugar lowering effects of these treatments will be studied.

groundtruth: Zostanie przeprowadzona analiza oddziaływania kuracji na bezpieczeństwo oraz obniżenia poziomu cukru w krwi.

eng: At present, an accurate clinical lab test to predict the onset of the sepsis pathology does not exist.

eng: The study will investigate the dose response relationship for the combinations and monotherapies.

eng: Your doctor probably thinks you need a stitch in your cervix (the neck of your uterus), to help you support your growing baby.

groundtruth: Pani lekarz prawdopodobnie uważa, że należy zaszyć szyjkę macicy, żeby zabezpieczyć rosnące tam dziecko.

eng: Second, this study will contribute to a better understanding of the hemodynamic effect of volume-overload and/or pressure-overload of the right ventricle.

groundtruth: Po drugie, te badania przyczyniają się do lepszego zrozumienia efektu hemodynamicznego hiperwolemii i / lub przeciążenia ciśnieniowego prawej komory.

eng: If you have been exposed, you should go to your doctor for tests.

groundtruth: Jeżeli zostali Państwo poddani ekspozycji w jakikolwiek sposób, powinnni Państwo zgłosić się do lekarza na badania.

eng: Patients were excluded if they were under the age of 18 or in suspected cases of hospital-acquired or aspiration pneumonia.

eng: This may represent a different process than the classic choroidal neovascularization seen in other macular diseases.

eng: The nurse case manager coordinates care with the patient's physician, family and other health care professionals.

eng: Safety assessments will be based on collection of adverse events (AEs), physical examinations, vital signs, laboratory parameters, and evaluation of dialysis parameters.

groundtruth: Ocena bezpieczeństwa będzie się opierać na zebraniu niepożądanych zdarzeń (AEs), badań lekarskich, oznak życia, parametrów laboratoryjnych oraz na ocenie parametrów dializy.

eng: Patient suffers from hip fracture that will need hip arthroplasty.

eng: Patient will be followed daily for the initial 48 hours and then once per week for 2 weeks while mechanically ventilated.

eng: Evaluation will be done by examining urine or stool samples for Schistosomiasis including egg counts for the positive cases.

eng: All children and adolescents with type 1 diabetes mellitus attending Assaf Harofeh Pediatric Diabetes Clinic will be eligible for inclusion in the study.

eng: If you're considering breast augmentation with breast implants, the following information will provide you with a good introduction to the procedure.

eng: In Phase II, patients will be assigned to either the experimental arm or the control arm of the study.

groundtruth: Syndromy bólu nowotworowego można podzielić na ostre i przewlekłe bóle.

eng: Wound size, pro-inflammatory cytokines, smears and photo are made every 14 day at the hospital.

eng: A total of 57 of these women together had 108 pregnancies after hip replacements during the study period.

eng: This trial compares a treated group of patients with an untreated group of patients.

eng: Patient is, in the opinion of the investigator, willing and able to comply with the study medication regimen and all other study requirements.

eng: Prior chemotherapy or radiotherapy within 4 weeks prior to study entry (6 weeks for nitrosoureas and mitomycin C).

eng: This trial will assess the effects of MC-1 compared to placebo on cardiovascular and neurological events following CABG surgery.
